card.name: Royal Loox
card.description: Whenever you summon a monster costing 9 or more {{GOLD}}, deal 1 {{DMG}} to all enemies. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Deal 1 {{DMG}}.

description.now: Whenever you summon a monster costing 9 or more {{GOLD}}, deal 1 {{DMG}} to all enemies. {{KW:MAGIC}}: Deal 1 {{DMG}}.
description.prev: {{KW:MAGIC}}: Deal 1 {{DMG}}. If you have an ally monster costing 9 or more {{GOLD}}, also deal 1 {{DMG}} to all enemies.
